recordingPage.screenShotText: Take a screenshot of your result.
recordingPage.taskText: Surgical suture is a medical device used to hold body tissues together after an injury or surgery. Application generally involves using a needle with an attached length of thread. A number of different shapes, sizes, and thread materials have been developed over its millennia of history.
recordingPage.ulText1: Check if your hardware is ready
recordingPage.sidebarmsg: When you are ready, please press «Start recording»  to record your results.

chooseScreenshot.chooseResult: Choose the screenshot showing your result the best.

selfassesment.title: Self assesment
selfassesment.message: Select the example image that best matches your result

selfassesmentquestions.title: Self assessment questions
selfassesmentquestions.message: Please answer the questions to proceed
selfassesmentquestions.questionone: My knot was tied tightly and in the correct location

evaluation.title: Evaluation
evaluation.feedbacktext: Not bad. Next time try doing this and this to improve your technique. Next time try performing 2 left loops and 1 right loop.
evaluation.ratingtext: How was the case? Rate yourself
